DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether Yili `` Chang Qing '' Pro-ABB yoghurt effective improve mild constipation intestinal micro-ecology environment & alimentation .
DOC.brief_title: Study Yili `` Changqing '' Pro-ABB Yoghurt Improvement Human Gastrointestinal Tract System
DOC.criteria: 1 . Male female subject , 2545 yr ; 2 . Nonspecific and/or moderate constipation ; 3 . Irregular occasional gastrointestinal disorder ( flatulence , gurgling , feel heavy eating , abdominal pain ) ; 4 . Slow transit irregular bowel movement ( abnormal feces solidity , bowel movement decrease , e.g . every 23 day less 3 time per week ) . 1 . Diagnosed chronic constipation ; 2 . Treated gastrointestinal symptom ; 3 . Lactose Intolerance ; 4 . Treatment analgesic aspirin paracetamol ; 5 . Had laxatives remedy promote digestion 2 week prior study start ; 6 . Consuming dairy product supplement contain pro/prebiotic 10 day prior study start ; 7 . Currently suffer diarrhea .
